content: **get ready to stay cozy and stylish with this easy double_crochet stitch cowl pattern ** > **use code get1off at checkout for $1 off a pattern purchase ** **size ** small medium large top circumference = 19 20 21 /48 51 53 cm bottom circumference = 28 29 30 / 71 73 5 76 cm height 9 9 9 /23 23 23 cm **stitches & techniques used ** chains slip_stitch single_crochet double_crochet working in row and turned rounds **yarn ** #3 dk weight 150 180 210 total yards tippy tree yarns super dk 100% superwash merino wool 231 yds/100 g or we crochet gloss dk 123 yds/50 g or suitable substitute **tools ** us size h/8 5 0 mm crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge yarn needle scissors **other ** **read through all of the pattern notes before beginning** and please contact me if you ever have any questions about one of my patterns follow me on instagram @simplyhookedbyjanet join my facebook community and connect with other crochet enthusiasts https //www facebook com/groups/simplyhookedbyjanet copyright protected you may not redistribute pattern after purchase or publish any part as your own including photos you may sell finished products and if possible reference back to this pattern and/or give credit to simply hooked by janet as the original designer
